meanings.sent1: I saw a man smoking a durrie on the street.
meanings.sent2: In India, many people enjoy smoking durries.
meanings.sent3: The durrie looked like a tiny rolled-up carpet.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the durrie lingered in the air like a faint memory.
meanings.sent5: The durrie's thin paper crackled as it burned slowly.

meanings.definition: A type of rug or carpet.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's house has a beautiful durrie in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The durrie on the floor added warmth to the room.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the durrie for a picnic blanket.
meanings.sent4: The intricate patterns on the durrie told a story of tradition.
meanings.sent5: Walking barefoot on the durrie felt like stepping on a cloud.
